622260.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 6 (Token Pack)
622260.description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 6

This product depicts 56 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Cultists both male and female, Orcs both male and female, Ancient Black Dragon, Naga both male and female, Bullfrog Men, Lizardfolk, Giant Frogs, Giant Lizards, Crocodiles, Cultist Leader, Bullfrog Men Leader, Gargoyles, both intact and broken, Giant Centipede, Guard Drakes, Wil-o-wips, Specters and a Otyugh.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 2 Ancient Black Dragons
  • 2 Bullfrog Men
  • Bullfrog Man Leader
  • 4 Crocodiles
  • Cultist Female Orc
  • Cultist Leader
  • Male Cultist Orc
  • 2 Dragonclaws
  • 2 Dragonwings
  • Female Cultist
  • 4 Gargoyles
  • Giant Centipede
  • 2 Giant Frogs
  • 2 Giant Lizards
  • 4 Giant Spiders
  • 2 Grey Ooozes
  • 2 Guard Drakes
  • 2 Lizardfolk
  • 2 Lizardfolk Leaders
  • Otyugh
  • Red Wizard Casting
  • Shambling Mound
  • 3 Will-0-Wisps
  • Yuan Ti Abomination
  • 3 Yuan Ti malisons
  • Yuan Ti Pureblood
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
